links.pageTitle: Introduction | Mastra Docs
links.pageDescription: Mastra is a TypeScript agent framework. It helps you build AI applications and features quickly. It gives you the set of primitives you need: workflows, agents, RAG, integrations, syncs and evals.

links.pageTitle: Installing Mastra Locally | Getting Started | Mastra Docs
links.pageDescription: Guide on installing Mastra and setting up the necessary prerequisites for running it with various LLM providers.
